languages.text: {n}Капитан "Бессердечного" ловит ваш взгляд и вы читаете в его глазах отчаянное мужество приговоренного. Оскалившись, он дергает рычаг варп-двигателя.{/n} "Открыть врата! Мы летим в бездну, фон Валанциус, и у нас с тобой — место в первых рядах!"

{n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"
languages.original_text: {n}Капитан "Бессердечного" ловит ваш взгляд и вы читаете в его глазах отчаянное мужество приговоренного. Оскалившись, он дергает рычаг варп-двигателя.{/n} "Открыть врата! Мы летим в бездну, фон Валанциус, и у нас с тобой — место в первых рядах!"

{n}Sargona's eyes meet yours, and you see within the desperate courage of one who is condemned. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

languages.text: {n}La mirada del capitán de la Desalmada se cruza con la tuya y ves en sus ojos el valor desesperado de quien se sabe sin escapatoria. Te lanza una mueca de desprecio antes de tirar de la palanca del motor de disformidad.{/n} «¡Que se abran las puertas! ¡Vamos de cabeza al abismo, von Valancius, y nos he conseguido asientos en primera fila!».
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada del capitán de la Desalmada se cruza con la tuya y ves en sus ojos el valor desesperado de quien se sabe sin escapatoria. Te lanza una mueca de desprecio antes de tirar de la palanca del motor de disformidad.{/n} «¡Que se abran las puertas! ¡Vamos de cabeza al abismo, von Valancius, y nos he conseguido asientos en primera fila!».

languages.text: {n}无心号的舰长与你四目相对，目光中充满了破釜沉舟的勇气。你意识到，他已经明白自己在劫难逃。他冷笑一声，猛地拉动了亚空间引擎的操纵杆。{/n}“打开大门！一起坠入深渊吧，冯·瓦兰修斯！我们两个都该前排落座了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

traits.locale_text: {n}无心号的舰长与你四目相对，目光中充满了破釜沉舟的勇气。你意识到，他已经明白自己在劫难逃。他冷笑一声，猛地拉动了亚空间引擎的操纵杆。{/n}“打开大门！一起坠入深渊吧，冯·瓦兰修斯！我们两个都该前排落座了！”

languages.text: {n}Le regard du capitaine du Sans-Cœur croise le vôtre, et dans ses yeux vous décelez le courage suicidaire d'un homme qui se sait condamné. Un dernier rictus aux lèvres, il actionne le levier du moteur Warp.{/n} « Que les portes s'ouvrent en grand ! Nous mettons le cap sur les abysses, von Valancius, et nous sommes assis aux premières loges ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard du capitaine du Sans-Cœur croise le vôtre, et dans ses yeux vous décelez le courage suicidaire d'un homme qui se sait condamné. Un dernier rictus aux lèvres, il actionne le levier du moteur Warp.{/n} « Que les portes s'ouvrent en grand ! Nous mettons le cap sur les abysses, von Valancius, et nous sommes assis aux premières loges ! »

languages.text: {n}ハートレスのキャプテンがあなたの目と合い、その目の中に彼が絶望していることを知っている者の命がけの意地を見る。彼はあざ笑い、そしてワープエンジンのレバーを引く。{/n}「ゲートオープン！フォン・ヴァランシウス、いざ、深淵へ、お前と私はフロントシートに乗っている！」
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

traits.locale_text: {n}サルゴナの目があなたの目と合い、その目の中に彼が絶望していることを知っている者の命がけの意地を見る。彼はあざ笑い、そしてワープエンジンのレバーを引く。{/n}「ゲートオープン！フォン・ヴァランシウス、いざ、深淵へ、お前と私はフロントシートに乗っている！」

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini Taşkalp'in gözleriyle buluşturuyor ve onun gözlerinde, işinin bittiğini bilen birinin çaresiz cesaretini görüyorsun. Küçümseyici bir gülüşle öteboyut motorunun kolunu çekiyor.{/n} "Geçitler açılsın! Dibi boylayacağız von Valancius, en önde de ikimiz olacağız!"
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini Taşkalp'in gözleriyle buluşturuyor ve onun gözlerinde, işinin bittiğini bilen birinin çaresiz cesaretini görüyorsun. Küçümseyici bir gülüşle öteboyut motorunun kolunu çekiyor.{/n} "Geçitler açılsın! Dibi boylayacağız von Valancius, en önde de ikimiz olacağız!"

languages.text: {n}Der Captain der Heartless hält deinem Blick stand, und du erkennst in seinen Augen den verzweifelten Mut eines Todgeweihten. Dann zieht er mit einem spöttischen Lächeln den Hebel des Warp-Triebwerks.{/n} "Mögen sich die Tore öffnen! Wir fliegen in den Abyss, von Valancius, und wir beide sitzen in der ersten Reihe!"
languages.original_text: {n}The captain of the Heartless meets your gaze, and you see in his eyes the desperate courage of one who knows he is doomed. He sneers, then pulls the warp engine lever.{/n} "Let the gates open! We are headed for the abyss, von Valancius, and you and I have front row seats!"
